com.metreeca.gcloud.services

Class Datastore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metreeca.gcloud.services.Datastore

  • public final class Datastore
extends Object
    Google Cloud Datastore.

    Manages task execution on Cloud Datastore.

    Nested task executions on the datastore from the same thread will share the same transaction through a ThreadLocal context variable.

      • key

        public com.google.cloud.datastore.Key key(String type,
                                          String id)
        Creates a datastore key for a typed resource.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the resource
        id - the id of the resource
        Returns:
        a datastore key for the resource identified by id and type
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if either id or type is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if either id or type is empty

      • exec

        public <V> V exec(Function<com.google.cloud.datastore.Datastore,V> task)
        Executes a task inside a transaction on this datastore.

        If a transaction is not already active on the datastore, begins one and commits it on successful task completion; if the task throws an exception, the transaction is rolled back and the exception rethrown; in either case no action is taken if the transaction was already closed inside the task.

        Type Parameters:
        V - the type of the value returned by task
        Parameters:
        task - the task to be executed; takes as argument a datastore service
        Returns:
        the value returned by task
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if task is null or returns a null value
